bio: Currently working as a Data Scientist, I'm a curious developer passionate about the full spectrum of software and data development. My interests span from foundational data engineering and robust back-end systems to the cutting edge of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Large Language Models. I enjoy coding and architecting solutions across this entire stack.
focus: Building intuitive digital experiences, developing intelligent AI models, and engineering scalable data solutions. I thrive on continuous learning and applying elegant approaches to complex challenges in technology.
